DOC.brief_summary: Evidence suggest diet rich plant phenolic compound may induce beneficial vascular effect . Coffee good source phenolic compound call chlorogenic acid ( CGA ) , however level CGA reduce roast process . The aim study investigate effect coffee roast vascular response . The investigator hypothesize coffee roast lesser extent exert favourable vascular response heavily roast coffee due high level CGA .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect High Low Roasted Coffee Vascular Response
DOC.criteria: Male A signed consent form Age 1935 year Body mass index 18.530 kg/m2 Normal blood pressure screening ( < 150/90 ) Blood pressure > 150/90 mmHg Haemoglobin ( anaemia marker ) < 125 g/l Gamma GT ( liver enzymes ) > 80 IU/l Cholesterol > 6.5 mmol/l Had suffer myocardial infarction stroke previous 12 month Suffers reproductive disorder Suffers bloodclotting disorder Suffers metabolic disorder ( e.g . diabetes endocrine liver disease ) Any dietary restriction weight reduce diet Drinking 21 unit per week On lipidmodifying medication On blood pressure lower medication On medication affect blood clot Planning alter consumption vitamin supplements/fish oil capsule course study Regular vigorous exercise ( 3 times/week , 20 minute session ) Smoking Vegetarians vegan
